verses.text: And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w assembled|strong="H6950"\w* all the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w*, and the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w companies|strong="H4256"\w* that \w ministered|strong="H8334"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* by \w course|strong="H4256"\w*, and the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* over the \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w*, and \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* over the \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w*, and the \w stewards|strong="H8269"\w* over all the \w substance|strong="H7399"\w* and \w possession|strong="H4735"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, and of his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, with the \w officers|strong="H5631"\w*, and with the mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w*, and with all the valiant \w men|strong="H2428"\w*, unto \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.\f + \fr 28.1 \ft possession: or, cattle\f*\f + \fr 28.1 \ft and of…: or, and his sons\f*\f + \fr 28.1 \ft officers: or, eunuchs\f*

Then \w David|strong="H1732"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* stood \w up|strong="H6965"\w* upon his \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* me, my \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, and my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: \add As for me\add*, I \add had\add* in mine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w rest|strong="H4496"\w* for the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and for the \w footstool|strong="H1916"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and had made \w ready|strong="H3559"\w* for the \w building|strong="H1129"\w*:

But \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, Thou shalt not \w build|strong="H1129"\w* an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* for my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, because thou \add hast been\add* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, and hast \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*.\f + \fr 28.3 \ft blood: Heb. bloods\f*

Howbeit the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w chose|strong="H0977"\w* me before all the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* to be \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: for he hath \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \add to be\add* the \w ruler|strong="H5057"\w*; and of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of my \w father|strong="H0001"\w*; and among the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* he \w liked|strong="H7521"\w* me to make \add me\add* \w king|strong="H4427"\w* over all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:

And of all my \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, (for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* me \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*,) he hath \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* my \w son|strong="H1121"\w* to \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* upon the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of the \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, he shall \w build|strong="H1129"\w* my \w house|strong="H1004"\w* and my \w courts|strong="H2691"\w*: for I have \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* him \add to be\add* my \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and I will be his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*.

Moreover I will \w establish|strong="H3559"\w* his \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, if he be \w constant|strong="H2388"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* my \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* and my \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, as at this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 28.7 \ft constant: Heb. strong\f*

Now therefore in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and in the \w audience|strong="H0241"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* and \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* for all the \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: that ye may \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* this \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and leave \add it\add* for an \w inheritance|strong="H5157"\w* for your \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* you \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

¶ And thou, \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* my \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w know|strong="H3045"\w* thou the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* him with a \w perfect|strong="H8003"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* and with a \w willing|strong="H2655"\w* \w mind|strong="H5315"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w searcheth|strong="H1875"\w* all \w hearts|strong="H3824"\w*, and \w understandeth|strong="H0995"\w* all the \w imaginations|strong="H3336"\w* of the \w thoughts|strong="H4284"\w*: if thou \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* him, he will be \w found|strong="H4672"\w* of thee; but if thou \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* him, he will cast thee \w off|strong="H2186"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*.

Take \w heed|strong="H7200"\w* now; for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* thee to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* for the \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*: be \w strong|strong="H2388"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add*.

¶ Then \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* to \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* the \w pattern|strong="H8403"\w* of the \w porch|strong="H0197"\w*, and of the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* thereof, and of the \w treasuries|strong="H1597"\w* thereof, and of the upper \w chambers|strong="H5944"\w* thereof, and of the \w inner|strong="H6442"\w* \w parlours|strong="H2315"\w* thereof, and of the \w place|strong="H1004"\w* of the mercy \w seat|strong="H3727"\w*,

And the \w pattern|strong="H8403"\w* of all that he had by the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*, of the \w courts|strong="H2691"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and of all the \w chambers|strong="H3957"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, of the \w treasuries|strong="H0214"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and of the \w treasuries|strong="H0214"\w* of the dedicated \w things|strong="H6944"\w*:\f + \fr 28.12 \ft of all that…: Heb. of all that was with him\f*

Also for the \w courses|strong="H4256"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, and for all the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* of the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and for all the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of \w service|strong="H5656"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

\add He gave\add* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* by \w weight|strong="H4948"\w* for \add things\add* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, for all \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w* of all manner of \w service|strong="H5656"\w*; \add silver also\add* for all \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* by \w weight|strong="H4948"\w*, for all \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w* of every kind of \w service|strong="H5656"\w*:

Even the \w weight|strong="H4948"\w* for the \w candlesticks|strong="H4501"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and for their \w lamps|strong="H5216"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, by \w weight|strong="H4948"\w* for every \w candlestick|strong="H4501"\w*, and for the \w lamps|strong="H5216"\w* thereof: and for the \w candlesticks|strong="H4501"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* by \w weight|strong="H4948"\w*, \add both\add* for the \w candlestick|strong="H4501"\w*, and \add also\add* for the \w lamps|strong="H5216"\w* thereof, according to the \w use|strong="H5656"\w* of every \w candlestick|strong="H4501"\w*.

And by \w weight|strong="H4948"\w* \add he gave\add* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* for the \w tables|strong="H7979"\w* of \w shewbread|strong="H4635"\w*, for every \w table|strong="H7979"\w*; and \add likewise\add* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* for the \w tables|strong="H7979"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*:

Also \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* for the \w fleshhooks|strong="H4207"\w*, and the \w bowls|strong="H4219"\w*, and the \w cups|strong="H7184"\w*: and for the \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w basons|strong="H3713"\w* \add he gave gold\add* by \w weight|strong="H4948"\w* for every \w bason|strong="H3713"\w*; and \add likewise silver\add* by \w weight|strong="H4948"\w* for every \w bason|strong="H3713"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*:

And for the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* \w refined|strong="H2212"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* by \w weight|strong="H4948"\w*; and \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* for the \w pattern|strong="H8403"\w* of the \w chariot|strong="H4818"\w* of the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w*, that spread \w out|strong="H6566"\w* \add their wings\add*, and \w covered|strong="H5526"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

All \add this, said David\add*, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* made me \w understand|strong="H7919"\w* in \w writing|strong="H3791"\w* by \add his\add* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* upon me, \add even\add* all the \w works|strong="H4399"\w* of this \w pattern|strong="H8403"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Be \w strong|strong="H2388"\w* and of good \w courage|strong="H0553"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add it:\add* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* not, nor be \w dismayed|strong="H2865"\w*: for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \add even\add* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \add will be\add* with thee; he will not \w fail|strong="H7503"\w* thee, nor \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* thee, until thou hast \w finished|strong="H3615"\w* all the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* for the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And, behold, the \w courses|strong="H4256"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \add even they shall be with thee\add* for all the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: and \add there shall be\add* with thee for all manner of \w workmanship|strong="H4399"\w* every \w willing|strong="H5081"\w* skilful \w man|strong="H2451"\w*, for any manner of \w service|strong="H5656"\w*: also the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add will be\add* wholly at thy \w commandment|strong="H1697"\w*.
